document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Some </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">say </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">good </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">night </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">at </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">night </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">say </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">good </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">night </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">by </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">day </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">Good </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">bye </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Going </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9064a8">utter </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">Good </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">night, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">still </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9064a8">reply </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">For </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48ff56">parting, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">night, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9848ff">presence, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#58d4e8">simply </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">dawn </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Itself, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48ff56">purple </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">on </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9064a8">hight </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">Denominated </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">morn. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Some say good night at night
